channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Semi-solid state MagSafe power banks arrive from the founder of Hyper
item.description: A new company called BMX, founded by accessory royalty, has emerged from Kickstarter to make its SolidSafe semi-solid state power banks available to the general public. Like the Kuxiu semi-solid state power banks I've recently reviewed, BMX's promise to have twice the longevity and be safer than traditional power banks, which have been the subject […]...

item.title: Android 16 users can get early access to 163 new emojis that'll soon be everywhere – here’s how
item.description: You can now test out Trombone, Landslide, and Distorted Face in the Android 16 QPR3 beta.

item.title: I tested the Ricoh GR IV compact camera — it’s a surprising upgrade, for good and for bad
item.description: The long-awaited Ricoh GR IV delivers several improvements over its six-year-old predecessor, including a new 26MP stabilized sensor and better battery life.

item.title: The 14 Best Sexy Gifts for Lovers (2025)
item.description: Spice things up with our favorite sex toys, date-night boxes, and lingerie for every type of couple.

item.title: Firefox responds to AI backlash by promising a 'kill switch' for turning off controversial new features
item.description: The Firefox browser will soon include an AI ‘kill switch’ that will turn off all AI features, Mozilla has promised.

item.title: The MSI Raider 18 HX Distills the Best and Worst of Gaming Laptops
item.description: You can't have everything, even for $4,000, but the MSI Raider 18 HX offers enough performance for 4K.

item.title: The Morning After: The highest rated tech of 2025
item.description:
The best phone of 2025: The iPhone 17 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro? Perhaps the Galaxy Z Fold 7? All three rank as some of the best tech we reviewed in 2025. Engadget We have compiled all the best gear with our highest review scores in each category, after thousands of hours of testing. We’ve got the Switch 2, AirPods Pro 3 and DJI’s top drone for most of you. Anecdotally, Anker’s Laptop Power Bank, with two built-in charging cables, has been the sleeper hit of the Engadget team, with four editors making it their power bank of choice. I think it’s the retractable cable. — Mat Smith
OpenAI just launched ...

item.title: The 8 Best WIRED-Tested Handheld Vacuums (2025)
item.description: Lightweight, powerful, and generally inexpensive, the handheld vacuum is the perfect household helper.

item.title: We May Never Know the Truth About Matt Damon and James Cameron’s Silly ‘Avatar’ Beef
item.description: It's a he-said/he-said situation, as the director refutes the actor's claims about turning down a lucrative offer to star in the franchise.

item.title: A Starlink satellite just exploded and left 'trackable' debris
item.description: SpaceX said it experienced an anomaly with one if its Starlink satellites that was likely caused by a small explosion. "The anomaly led to venting of the propulsion tank, a rapid decay in semi-major axis by about 4 km [2.5 miles] and the release of a small number of trackable low relatively velocity objects," Starlink wrote in a post on X. Orbital tracking company LeoLabs assessed that the issue was caused by an "internal energetic source rather than a collision with space debris or another object." SpaceX said it's working with NASA and the US Space Force to track the remains of the object. ...

item.title: How to Quickly Find Out What's Streaming on Multiple Services at Once
item.description: Build a watchlist of all the movies and shows you want to watch, no matter where they’re streaming.

item.title: What Paralympic Athlete Monster Mike Schultz Packs for His Races
item.description: The world champion adaptive snowboard cross athlete repairs his own prostheses before a competition.

item.title: Dali's new speakers could be the ultimate budget-friendly buy for audiophiles and home theater fans – but they mean saying goodbye a modern legend
item.description: Dali has unveiled the new Sonik series, an upgrade to its award-winning Oberon line

item.title: Amiral Ventures | 40 millions pour dénicher les prochains Coveo et Shopify
item.description: Davantage de Shopify, de Lightspeed et de Coveo. La firme montréalaise Amiral Ventures vient d’annoncer la création de son premier fonds, d’une valeur de 40 millions de dollars, avec comme objectif de redonner un peu de cette ambition au secteur technologique québécois et canadien.

item.title: Fortnite Winterfest 2025 skins: every free and paid-for Outfit currently available, including Harry Potter and more
item.description: Here's the Fortnite Winterfest 2025 skins, including Harry Potter, Glacial Dummy, and Cheeks. This covers free rewards and paid-for Outfits.

item.title: ChatGPT Go arrive en France : prix, limites et fonctionnalités de l’offre à 8 €
item.description: Après des mois à creuser un fossé entre une version gratuite frustrante et un abonnement Plus trop cher pour le grand public, OpenAI lance ChatGPT Go en France. Pour 8 € par mois, vous avez accès à GPT-5.2. La vraie question ? Avez-vous encore besoin de payer plus cher ?

item.title: Pinned chats in ChatGPT are here – and so is a mildly annoying restriction
item.description: ChatGPT adds pinned chats, but only three at a time, so choose wisely

item.title: The 6 P’s of pricing strategy
item.description: How to turn pricing into a growth lever Pricing is one of the most powerful growth levers a business has, yet it is still one of the most overlooked. While teams spend months refining product and brand, pricing decisions are too often rushed, emotionally charged, or guided by instinct rather than insight.

item.title: I helped build the internet. Now I am making the case for logging off
item.description: The answer lies in the simple act of logging off and getting out in nature. My work across decades has spanned sectors, geographies, and cultures, focusing on exploration, discovery, and innovation. My husband and I have defined our work across business, nonprofit, and philanthropy simply: “We invest in people and ideas that can change the world.”

item.title: Freebox : 8 chaînes offertes aux abonnés dès le 29 décembre
item.description: À partir du 29 décembre, Free offre à ses abonnés plusieurs chaînes habituellement payantes, pour une durée limitée.

item.title: Le développement du prochain jeu de Naughty Dog (The Last of US) va déjà mal
item.description: Le studio Naughty Dog est au travail sur son prochain blockbuster. Après Uncharted et The Last of Us, les regards se tournent vers l'espace dans The Heretic Prophet. Une enquête révèle les coulisses du projet.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel slams Trumps primetime speech as 18 straight minutes of him yelling
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel unpacked Donald Trump's primetime address from the White House.

item.title: Le SSD portable Crucial X10 et ses 6 To de stockage perdent 120 € sur Amazon
item.description: Léger, performant et avec un espace de stockage de 6 To, le Crucial X10 va rapidement devenir un de vos meilleurs alliés, surtout avec cette offre d'Amazon qui vous fait économiser 120 euros.

item.title: How RomCom became a multipurpose cyberweapon
item.description: How this formidable malware family is rapidly turning into a Swiss army knife for rogue nations and cybercriminals

item.title: The Avatar Game Is So Good, They Don’t Need to Make the Movies Anymore
item.description: See the new movie Avatar: Fire and Ash if you’d like. But if you really want to experience the big blue world of Pandora, the video game is where it’s at.

item.title: Criminals might use ‘GhostPairing’ to hijack your WhatsApp account – here’s how to stop them
item.description: 'GhostPairing' could give criminals access to your WhatsApp account, but there are ways to prevent this happening.

item.title: Stephen Colbert gleefully mocks Trumps White House address
item.description: Donald Trump gave a primetime address from the White House on Thursday and Stephen Colbert unpacked it on "The Late Show."

item.title: Mauvaise nouvelle pour l’arrivée en France du Toyota Urban Cruiser électrique
item.description: Le lancement européen du Toyota Urban Cruiser est en cours. Malheureusement, la marque nous a annoncé que la France serait privée de cette voiture électrique créée avec Suzuki, du moins dans un premier temps.

item.title: Leapmotor : bonne nouvelle confirmée pour le prix de 4 voitures électriques chinoises de Stellantis vendue en Europe avec cette décision
item.description: C'est officiel : les Leapmotor B10 et leurs petites sœurs ne viendront plus de Chine, mais d'Espagne dès 2026. Une décision stratégique de Stellantis qui change tout pour le prix de ces voitures électriques : bonus écologique et fin des frais de douane sont au programme.

item.title: « Une mascarade », l’hydrogène se fait tacler à la gorge par Volkswagen
item.description: Si vous attendiez une Volkswagen à hydrogène pour remplacer votre TDI, arrêtez d'espérer. Thomas Schäfer, le patron de la marque, vient de doucher froidement les derniers optimistes. Pour lui, le débat sur l'hydrogène dans les voitures de monsieur Tout-le-monde est tout simplement « inutile ». C'est dit.

item.title: Your AI strategy is your leadership philosophy
item.description: Do you believe your people are fundamentally creative and motivated, or lazy and in need of control? AI is forcing every leader into a choice they can’t dodge: do you believe your people are fundamentally creative and motivated, or lazy and in need of control?

item.title: Les petites Volkswagen thermiques sont mortes : le constructeur allemand mise tout sur l’électrique et ses batteries maison
item.description: C'est officiel, une page se tourne à Wolfsburg. Thomas Schäfer, le patron de Volkswagen, vient de confirmer ce que tout le monde redoutait : les petites voitures thermiques, c'est fini. La raison ? Ce n'est même pas de l'écologie, c'est purement économique.

item.title: Un téléviseur Google TV à ce prix-là ? Thomson baisse les prix de deux modèles pour Noël [Sponso]
item.description: Vous recherchez le téléviseur le moins cher possible ? Thomson baisse actuellement le prix de deux de ses références chez Auchan.

item.title: Après la grogne des utilisateurs, LG déploie une option pour retirer le raccourci Microsoft AI Copilot de l’interface webOS
item.description: Vous avez allumé votre TV LG cette semaine et découvert une nouvelle icône mystérieuse ? Vous n'êtes pas seul. LG a cru bon d'installer d'office Microsoft Copilot chez tout le monde, sans rien demander. Face à la levée de boucliers, le constructeur coréen bat en retraite.

item.title: Netflix en janvier 2026 : Stranger Things, La Chronique des Bridgerton, L’amour ouf… voici les films et séries à ne pas manquer
item.description: Netflix vient de dévoiler le catalogue de ses sorties prévues en janvier 2026. Voici les films, séries, documentaires, stand-up et directs sportifs à ne pas manquer lors de ce début d'année qui démarre avec le final de Stranger Things !

item.title: The ASUS ROG Swift gaming monitor is down to its best-ever price at Amazon — save $400
item.description: As of Dec. 19, the ASUS ROG Swift 32-inch 4K OLED gaming monitor has returned to its lowest-ever price of $899 at Amazon, 31% off its list price of $1,299.

item.title: How to watch Mrs. Deshpande online for FREE – from outside India and in the USA
item.description: Want to watch Mrs. Deshpande from anywhere? Stream every chilling twist as a copycat killer emerges and a dark past resurfaces.

item.title: Amazon Alexa dévoile la liste des questions les plus posées par les Français en 2025
item.description: Alors que l'année 2025 touche à sa fin, Amazon a passé au crible des millions d’interactions pour dresser le palmarès des questions les plus posées à Alexa par les Français. Des requêtes très terre à terre, comme la cuisson des asperges ou le prix de l’or, côtoient des interrogations sur Cristiano Ronaldo, Gims, Kylian Mbappé ou les grands clubs de football....

item.title: ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ Season 2 Will Build on Matt and Jessica Jones’ Brilliant ‘Defenders’ Pairing
item.description: Charlie Cox thinks that, nine years later, the MCU will finally pay off the potential of one of the best parts of 'The Defenders.'

item.title: From Queer-Baiting to Neurodivergence: ‘Heated Rivalry’s Author Tackles Fan Theories and Controversy
item.description: “I didn't expect this book to be analyzed like The Great Gatsby,” hockey smut author Rachel Reid tells WIRED.

item.title: 7 designers on the most influential rebrands of 2025
item.description: From Cracker Barrel to Walmart, these rebrands rocked the design world. Over the past several years, the art of the rebrand has increasingly become a spectacle sport. From cultural institutions like the Philadelphia Art Museum, which reportedly fired its CEO over a poorly received rebrand this year, to the furniture brand La-Z-Boy, which was widely praised for its modern revamp, the internet’s attention economy has meant that almost no notable rebrand is safe from social media’s deluge of hot takes....

item.title: The 12 objects that defined 2025, for better or for worse
item.description: From frog costumes to bucket hats, these 12 objects tell the story of 2025. Every year the world gets a little more digital—and every year we still find surprise, delight, and meaning in the physical and the material. Like books or movies, the objects we obsessed over tell a story about the year gone by. So to continue a tradition that goes back several years now, here’s my look at the objects that tell the story of 2025: the joys, the absurdities, and the difficult-to-explain. ...

item.title: How The New Yorker digitized its entire magazine archive
item.description: The archive includes an article about how the moon landing would take place before the actual moon landing, an analysis from the early days of commercial aviation, and some of the first-ever TV criticism. You can now read every article that has ever appeared in The New Yorker—from as early as February 1925—with the click of a button.

item.title: Threat actor landscape: what every CISO must know to stay ahead
item.description: Organizations should build their cybersecurity programs around their adversaries—not assumptions.

item.title: Des TV RGB MiniLED de 55 pouces et plus dès le second trimestre 2026 chez Hisense en France
item.description: Hisense prépare l’arrivée en France, en 2026, d’une nouvelle gamme complète de téléviseurs RGB MiniLED, avec des modèles de 55 à 100 pouces, pensée pour rendre accessible cette technologie après le 116UX lancé en 2025.
